document.full_text: japan's government is likely to set aside more than 3 trillion yen ($35 billion) for its first extra budget for disaster relief, the asahi newspaper reported on wednesday.
document.title: japan to compile 3 trillion yen extra budget: media
lines_and_colors: japan's government is likely to set aside more than 3 trillion yen ($35 billion) for its first extra budget for disaster relief, the asahi newspaper reported on wednesday.
